title: Blended Learning for Metacognitive Skill Development: Short-Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational operations experience or job-related expertise
context.additional_context: Metaverse-based learning environment support for strengthening social sector job competencies among current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve work-related problems by utilizing at least three metacognitive strategies (self-assessment-planning-adjustment) via a mobile platform within one week.
Learners can perform the process of writing metacognitive journals and reflecting on feedback with an achievement rate of 80% or higher in weekly formative assessments.
Learners can systematically record and improve their learning process three or more times using digital tools (quiz apps, note-taking apps) in a blended learning environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
